moves.10. Nf3 f6 11. O-O Kf7 12. Nbd2 Bd6: 12. .......... Bd6 - but I still have work to do.

moves.25... b6 26. Kh2 Re8 27. Rbc2 c5 28. a4: 28. ............. Ree7 - My queenside pawn majority has been preserved and Castle Acre and Castle Rising still protect King Henry!

moves.46. Ke4 Rh4+ 47. Kf3 Rb4 48. Re7 Rgg4: 48. ........... Rgg4 - my rooks have tried to line up to execute the Firing Squad but the white rook is determined to spoil the party.
moves.49. Re6 Rbf4+: 49. ............ Rbf4 , it is here that the seed of a plan germinates in my mind.  Over the next few moves it flourishes into ............
